domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

data.text: @Delta Hi! I am flying Delta-KLM internationally. I can not add luggage to my flight. KLM is saying I’ll have to pay for luggage at the airport through Delta. How much should I expect to pay to add checked luggage at the airport?

data.text: @Delta we flew with our 14month old for Thanksgiving this year & all of the staff we encountered at the airports & flight crews were AMAZING! Delta will certainly be at the top of the list next time we fly. Keep up the great work. #CustomerService #greatjob #happycustomer

data.text: Hey @Delta for about 5 months now your app won't let me add tickets to my apple wallet. When are you fixing this flaw?  Its most annoying
